nodes.text: The DL-44 metal pistol was a type of blaster pistol used during the time of the Galactic Civil War. It resembled the DL-44 heavy blaster pistol, except it was more metallic in appearance. A roughed and powerful sidearm for all occasions, the weapon was finished with a fine chrome. A variant of this weapon was the DL-44 "Dosh Special" pistol, a weapon of envy for many junior Trandoshans. Another variant was the DL-44 XT, an extended design which used a metal housing to provide the weapon with a more substantial feel and increased accuracy due to the improved balance.
